contacts.name: Regin
contacts.signature: Do not contact for non-research funding matters

111390000.text: How is it this time? Did the sensor give out a false reading?

111390001.text: The advertisement poster here is indeed abnormal. I didn't think this little critter would be so good at hiding

111390002.text: It's not a false reading, but there's nothing new here. It just picked a new place to hide in the advertisement image

111390003.text: An ad poster? So it's got some level of art appreciation? That's vital!

111390004.text: Make sure you rest if you've got nothing else going on. I can't tell when the sensor will find something again. You need to be prepared!
